attributes.action: Enforce a cap on Energy Companies price rises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Energy companies in the UK are raising their prices in a seemingly never ending round of hikes. These same energy companies are announcing massive profits and raising the amounts of their shareholder dividends by almost the same amount as the price rises. I call on the Government to enforce a cap on price rises, and put an end to this blatent profiteering!
